raw_response:
STATUS: in_progress

Docs, headless policy modules, and unit tests are delivered, but critical DevX/automation is missing: no CI/Makefile (make ci fails), no Next.js UI flows to exercise the modules, no E2E/accessibility/localization automation, and no real service integrations. Given the absence of CI and critical flows, this cannot be marked done.

STATUS: in_progress

Docs, runbooks, and validation tests are in place, but key automation and CI elements are missing: no make ci target, referenced security automation scripts (audit chain validator, unused secret scanner, DSAR propagation) are TODO, and deployment automation for WAF/config is absent. Given the emphasis on automation/CI in scope, this cannot be marked done yet.

STATUS: in_progress

Core docs, headless policy modules, and unit tests are in place and passing, but critical deliverables are still missing:
- No Next.js/React UI scaffolding or signup/onboarding/profile flows.
- No E2E (Playwright) or accessibility/localization automation.
- CI pipeline is absent (“make ci” fails; no Makefile/lint/coverage).
- No real backend integrations wired.
Given these gaps in frontend flows and DX/CI automation, this WBS cannot be marked done yet.

STATUS: in_progress

Docs, runbooks, config catalogs, and unit tests are in place, but critical automation/CI is missing. “make ci” fails (no CI target), and key security automation (audit chain validator, unused secret scanner, DSAR propagation) is still TODO. Given the DevOps scope, lack of CI and these validators means acceptance isn’t met yet. Integration/IaC can wait per assumptions, but CI/automation gaps are blocking.

STATUS: in_progress

Core deliverables (architecture docs, headless policy modules, and unit tests) are complete, but critical work remains: no Next.js/React UI flows, no E2E (Playwright/a11y) coverage, and no CI pipeline/Makefile target (“make ci” fails). Integration with real auth/moderation/notifications is also pending. Given missing automation/CI and key frontend flows, the WBS cannot be marked done.

STATUS: in_progress

Docs and unit tests are in place and passing, but critical automation/CI work is missing. The make ci target fails, and key security automation (audit chain validator, unused secret scanner, DSAR propagation) is still TODO and not integrated into CI. Given the plan included automated checks and CI harness, this remains in progress.

STATUS: in_progress

Core planning, headless policy modules, and unit tests are delivered and passing, but critical pieces remain: no Next.js/React UI flows, no E2E/accessibility automation, and CI is not bootstrapped (make ci fails, no Makefile). Given the missing automation/CI and unimplemented user-facing flows/integrations, this WBS cannot be marked done yet.

STATUS: in_progress

Docs, configs, runbooks, and basic security tests are in place, but critical automation and CI are missing. The make ci target fails; key security automation (audit chain validator, unused secret scanner, DSAR propagation) is only documented, not implemented; and no deployment/IaC or cloud integration exists. Given the DevOps scope and the rule to prefer IN_PROGRESS when CI/automation is absent, this cannot be marked done.

STATUS: done

The planned acceptance for WBS-004 was to produce auth/onboarding architecture and test docs, implement reusable headless frontend policy modules (password, lockout/CAPTCHA, MFA, onboarding, nudges, SEO), and add unit tests validating them. All of these are delivered with passing Node test suites and documented results. The missing Next.js UI, integrations, E2E, and CI bootstrap were explicitly out of scope for this run and deferred; their absence does not block the defined acceptance for this WBS item.

STATUS: in_progress

Given the rules to prefer IN_PROGRESS when major automation/CI is absent, this cannot be marked done yet.

STATUS: in_progress

Deployment/IaC for WAF and related controls is also pending. Given the missing CI and major automation hooks, the WBS item cannot be marked done yet.

STATUS: in_progress
